sense.gloss: ridding oneself, freeing oneself of, growing out of, overcoming, outgrowing
withdrawal (e.g. from an organization), secession, leaving, pulling out
dropping out, falling behind, falling by the wayside, desertion
omission, being left out, missing part
admiring (someone) greatly, taking one's hat off to
ecdysis, shedding (of skin), sloughing, molting, moulting, casting off
to take off (clothes, shoes, etc.), to undress
liberation from earthly desires and the woes of man, deliverance of one's soul, moksha, mukti, vimukti
to escape from, to get out
attaching and detaching, putting on and removing
to throw off (clothes), to cast off, to fling off, to kick off (shoes)
to cast off (old ideas, habits, etc.), to discard
to come out, to fall out, to be omitted, to be missing, to escape, to come loose
to be clear, to be transparent (e.g. of the sky)
to be stupid, to be absentminded, to be careless, to be inattentive
to go through, to pass through, to give way, to collapse
to finish a round with more than 88 points (not counting points gained from scoring combinations)
to slip out, to sneak away, to break free, to get through (a difficult situation)
to break into the lead, to get ahead
to begin to fall out (e.g. hair)
setting oneself free from the life of a white-collar worker, quitting a job as a salaryman and launching an independent business
fallen hair, combings, hair left on comb
evasion of the law, circumvention of the law
cast-off skin (snake, insect, etc.), husk, empty shell, exuvia, exuviae
finishing writing, completion of a manuscript
to pitch in and help, to give someone a hand
shed skin (of a snake, insect, etc.), ecdysis
out-of-body experience, astral projection, sensation of physically leaving your body
to come off, to slip down, to slip off

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑服↑↓ふく↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでいる。
sdata.e: I'm undressing.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑直↑↓ただ↓ちにクラブを↑脱退↑↓だったい↓したほうがよい。
sdata.e: You may as well withdraw from the club right away.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぐには↑及↑↓およ↓ばない。
sdata.e: You need not take off your shoes.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑脱帽↑↓だつぼう↓するよ。
sdata.e: I take my hat off to you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にはシャッポを↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぐよ。
sdata.e: I take my hat off to you!

sdata.j: ↑靴下↑↓くつした↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでください。
sdata.e: Take off your socks, please.

sdata.j: ↑靴下↑↓くつした↓はお↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎください。
sdata.e: Take off your socks, please.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎなさい。
sdata.e: Take off your shoes.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いで↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please take off your shoes.

sdata.j: どうぞ↑靴↑↓くつ↓をお↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎ↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please take off your shoes.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでから↑家↑↓いえ↓には↑入↑↓はい↓ってください。
sdata.e: Please remove your shoes before entering the house.

sdata.j: ↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓る↑時↑↓とき↓は↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎなさい。
sdata.e: Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.

sdata.j: ↑汽車↑↓きしゃ↓が↑脱線↑↓だっせん↓した。
sdata.e: The train was derailed.

sdata.j: ↑患者↑↓かんじゃ↓は↑今↑↓いま↓や↑危機↑↓きき↓を↑脱↑↓だっ↓した。
sdata.e: The patient is out of danger now.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑店↑↓みせ↓は↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたが、↑今↑↓いま↓や↑窮地↑↓きゅうち↓を↑脱↑↓だっ↓して、↑商売↑↓しょうばい↓を↑拡張↑↓かくちょう↓するまでになっている。
sdata.e: We thought their shop was a failure, but now they've gotten out from under and even expanded.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちはもう↑危険↑↓きけん↓を↑脱↑↓だっ↓しました。
sdata.e: We're in no danger now.

sdata.j: ↑貨車↑↓かしゃ↓が↑脱線↑↓だっせん↓したため↑中央↑↓ちゅうおう↓↑線↑↓せん↓は↑不通↑↓ふつう↓になった。
sdata.e: After some freight cars were derailed, services were suspended on the Chuo Line.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓るときは↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぐのが↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓です。
sdata.e: It is our custom to take off our shoes when we enter the house.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓にあがる↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓げば↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑泥↑↓どろ↓を↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑持↑↓も↓ち↑込↑↓こ↓まずにすむ。
sdata.e: If you take your shoes off before coming into the house you won't bring in any dirt from your shoes.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓としても↑今晩↑↓こんばん↓↑脱獄↑↓だつごく↓するんだ。さもなきゃ↑気↑↓き↓が↑狂↑↓くる↓ってしまう。
sdata.e: We've got to break out tonight or I'll go crazy!

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓とかそこから↑脱出↑↓だっしゅつ↓した。
sdata.e: We made it out of there.

sdata.j: ↑右腕↑↓うわん↓の↑関節↑↓かんせつ↓が↑脱臼↑↓だっきゅう↓したようです。
sdata.e: I'm afraid I dislocated my right arm.

sdata.j: われわれの↑脱出↑↓だっしゅつ↓は↑奇跡↑↓きせき↓というほかなかった。
sdata.e: Our escape was nothing short of a miracle.

sdata.j: パンツとブラジャー↑以外↑↓いがい↓は↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでください。
sdata.e: Please take off all your clothes except your underpants and bra.

sdata.j: パットは↑服↑↓ふく↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎ↑捨↑↓す↓てて、↑水↑↓みず↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑飛↑↓と↓び↑込↑↓こ↓んだ。
sdata.e: Pat stripped off his clothes and dived in.

sdata.j: トムは↑服↑↓ふく↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いでパジャマを↑着↑↓き↓た。
sdata.e: Tom took off his clothes and put on his pajamas.

sdata.j: トニーはシャツを↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いで、それでピアノのよごれを↑落↑↓お↓としました。
sdata.e: Tony took off his shirt and cleaned the piano with it.

sdata.j: とても↑暑↑↓あつ↓かったので↑上着↑↓うわぎ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いだ。
sdata.e: It was so hot I took my coat off.

sdata.j: とても↑暑↑↓あつ↓かったので↑上着↑↓うわぎ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いだ。
sdata.e: It was extremely hot, so I took my coat off.

sdata.j: ↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いで↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please take off your hat.
